articles.author: Jez Corden
articles.title: Indiana Jones and the Great Circle gets its first patch on Xbox and PC, with a nice feature for those of you with particularly beefy NVIDIA GPUs - Windows Central
articles.description: Ray Tracing and bug fixes arrive for Indiana Jones and the Great Circle, which is available now in early access on Xbox and PC.
articles.content:
What you need to know
  • Indiana Jones and the Great Circle is available now for Deluxe Edition owners and for everyone else on Xbox and PC on December 9, 2024.
